SELECT CASE T1.CHECK_GRADE_CODE WHEN 1 THEN '合格品' WHEN 2 THEN '次品' WHEN 3 THEN '废品' WHEN 4 THEN '特废品' WHEN 9 THEN '试验胎' ELSE '无品级' END CHECK_GRADE_NAME , T1.* , CASE T1.MAIN_STATE WHEN 0 THEN '新建' WHEN 1 THEN '已确认' ELSE '' END MAIN_STATE_CAPTION , T2.USER_NAME RECORD_USER_NAME , TO_DATE(T3.DOC_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') DOC_DATE_SHOW , T3.S_N_NO , T3.OUT_DATE , T4.CUSTOME_NAME CUSTOMER_NAME , T5.MATERIAL_NAME , T7.USER_NAME UPDATE_USER_NAME , T8.USER_NAME AFFIRM_USER_NAME , T9.TYRE_NO , T9.GREEN_TYRE_NO FROM PSM_OUT_STOCK_MAIN T1 LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T2 ON T1.RECORD_USER_ID = T2.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSM_OUT_STOCK_BILL T3 ON T1.BILL_ID = T3.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSB_CUSTOMER T4 ON T3.CUSTOMER_OBJID = T4.OBJID LEFT JOIN SBM_MATERIAL T5 ON T1.MATERIAL_ID = T5.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T7 ON T1.UPDATE_USER_ID = T7.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T8 ON T1.AFFIRM_USER_ID = T8.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSM_OUT_STOCK_DETAIL T9 ON T9.BILL_ID = T1.BILL_ID AND T9.MAIN_ID = T1.OBJID
T9.TYRE_NO IN($where.MANY_TYRE_NO_INFOR$)
T1.OBJID = #where.OBJID#
T3.DOC_DATE >= TO_CHAR(#where.BeginDate#, 'YYYYMMDD')
T3.DOC_DATE <= TO_CHAR(#where.EndDate#, 'YYYYMMDD')
T3.OUT_DATE >= #where.BeginOutDate#
T3.OUT_DATE <= #where.EndOutDate#
T1.AFFIRM_TIME >= #where.BeginTime#
T1.AFFIRM_TIME <= #where.EndTime#
T3.S_N_NO = #where.SNNo#
T3.CUSTOMER_ID = #where.CustomerId#
T1.MAIN_STATE = #where.MainState#
T4.CUSTOME_NAME like '%' || #where.CustomerName# || '%'
T5.MATERIAL_NAME like '%' || #where.MaterialName# || '%'
T8.USER_NAME like '%' || #where.AffirmUserName# || '%'
T9.GREEN_TYRE_NO = #where.MANY_GREEN_TYRE_NO_INFOR#
T1.DELETE_FLAG = #where.DELETE_FLAG# AND T3.DELETE_FLAG = #where.DELETE_FLAG# AND T9.DELETE_FLAG = #where.DELETE_FLAG#
ORDER BY $OrderString$
ORDER BY T3.DOC_DATE, T3.S_N_NO, T4.CUSTOME_NAME, T1.LINE_ITEM_NO

SELECT T1.* , CASE T1.MAIN_STATE WHEN 0 THEN '新建' WHEN 1 THEN '已确认' ELSE '' END MAIN_STATE_CAPTION , CASE T1.CHECK_GRADE_CODE WHEN 1 THEN '合格品' WHEN 2 THEN '次品' WHEN 3 THEN '废品' WHEN 4 THEN '特废品' WHEN 9 THEN '试验胎' ELSE '无品级' END CHECK_GRADE_NAME , T2.USER_NAME RECORD_USER_NAME , TO_DATE(T3.DOC_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') DOC_DATE_SHOW , T3.S_N_NO , T3.OUT_DATE , T4.CUSTOME_NAME CUSTOMER_NAME , T5.MATERIAL_NAME , T7.USER_NAME UPDATE_USER_NAME , T8.USER_NAME AFFIRM_USER_NAME FROM PSM_OUT_STOCK_MAIN T1 LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T2 ON T1.RECORD_USER_ID = T2.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSM_OUT_STOCK_BILL T3 ON T1.BILL_ID = T3.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSB_CUSTOMER T4 ON T3.CUSTOMER_OBJID = T4.OBJID LEFT JOIN SBM_MATERIAL T5 ON T1.MATERIAL_ID = T5.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T7 ON T1.UPDATE_USER_ID = T7.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T8 ON T1.AFFIRM_USER_ID = T8.OBJID
(T1.OBJID = #where.OBJID#)

SELECT T1.* , CASE T1.DETAIL_STATE WHEN 0 THEN '未确认' WHEN 1 THEN '已确认' ELSE '' END DETAIL_STATE_CAPTION , CASE T4.CHECK_GRADE_CODE WHEN 1 THEN '合格品' WHEN 2 THEN '次品' WHEN 3 THEN '废品' WHEN 4 THEN '特废品' WHEN 9 THEN '试验胎' ELSE '无品级' END CHECK_GRADE_NAME , T2.USER_NAME RECORD_USER_NAME , T4.LINE_ITEM_NO, T4.STORAGE_LOC , T5.STORE_NAME , T6.STORE_PLACE_NAME , T7.USER_NAME UPDATE_USER_NAME , T8.USER_NAME AFFIRM_USER_NAME , T9.S_N_NO , T10.MATERIAL_NAME FROM PSM_OUT_STOCK_DETAIL T1 LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T2 ON T1.RECORD_USER_ID = T2.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSM_OUT_STOCK_SUMMARY T3 ON T1.SUMMARY_ID = T3.OBJID AND T1.MAIN_ID = T3.MAIN_ID AND T1.BILL_ID = T3.BILL_ID LEFT JOIN PSM_OUT_STOCK_MAIN T4 ON T1.MAIN_ID = T4.OBJID AND T1.BILL_ID = T4.BILL_ID LEFT JOIN PSB_STORE T5 ON T3.STORE_ID = T5.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSB_STORE_PLACE T6 ON T3.STORE_PLACE_ID = T6.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T7 ON T3.UPDATE_USER_ID = T7.OBJID LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T8 ON T3.AFFIRM_USER_ID = T8.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSM_OUT_STOCK_BILL T9 ON T1.BILL_ID = T9.OBJID LEFT JOIN SBM_MATERIAL T10 ON T3.MATERIAL_ID = T10.OBJID
T1.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND T1.MAIN_ID = #where.OBJID#
ORDER BY T5.STORE_NAME, T6.STORE_PLACE_NAME, T1.TYRE_NO
SELECT '1' sskey, '按凭证日期' ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '2' sskey, '按确认时间' ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '3' sskey, '按硫化号' ssValue FROM dual
SELECT 0 sskey, '未确认' ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT 1 sskey, '已确认' ssValue FROM dual
SELECT OBJID sskey, CLASS_NAME ssValue FROM SSB_CLASS WHERE DELETE_FLAG = '0' ORDER BY OBJID
SELECT OBJID sskey, SHIFT_NAME ssValue FROM SSB_SHIFT WHERE DELETE_FLAG = '0' ORDER BY OBJID
